languages.text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса светлеет.{/n} "С превеликим удовольствием, {name}. Возможно, я знаю не столь много секретов и комбинаций, как человек, когда-то обучивший меня, но я могу посвятить тебя в основы..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса светлеет.{/n} "С превеликим удовольствием, {name}. Возможно, я знаю не столь много секретов и комбинаций, как человек, когда-то обучивший меня, но я могу посвятить тебя в основы..."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Хейнрикса светлеет.{/n} "С превеликим удовольствием, {name}. Возможно, я знаю не столь много секретов и комбинаций, как человек, когда-то обучивший меня, но я могу посвятить тебя в основы..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"
{n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"
{n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"
{n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"

languages.text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了明快的表情。{/n}“这是我的荣幸，{name}。或许我不像我的老师那样懂得那么多技巧与组合，不过我可以向你介绍一些基本知识——”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了明快的表情。{/n}“这是我的荣幸，{name}。或许我不像我的老师那样懂得那么多技巧与组合，不过我可以向你介绍一些基本知识——”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Heinrix se ilumina.{/n} «Será un placer enorme, {name}. Aunque no conozco tantas tácticas y combinaciones como la persona que me enseñó, puedo cubrir los conceptos básicos y...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Heinrix se ilumina.{/n} «Será un placer enorme, {name}. Aunque no conozco tantas tácticas y combinaciones como la persona que me enseñó, puedo cubrir los conceptos básicos y...».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの表情が明るくなる。{/n}「喜んで、{name}。基礎を教えてくれた師匠ほど多くの技やコンビネーションを知らないかもしれないが、基本的なことはできるはずだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの表情が明るくなる。{/n}「喜んで、{name}。基礎を教えてくれた師匠ほど多くの技やコンビネーションを知らないかもしれないが、基本的なことはできるはずだ…」

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Heinrix s'illumine.{/n} « Ce serait avec grand plaisir, {name}. Je ne connais peut-être pas autant de combinaisons et de stratégies que mon mentor, mais je peux vous enseigner les bases... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Heinrix s'illumine.{/n} « Ce serait avec grand plaisir, {name}. Je ne connais peut-être pas autant de combinaisons et de stratégies que mon mentor, mais je peux vous enseigner les bases... »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht hellt sich auf.{/n} "Es wäre mir ein Vergnügen, {name}. Ich kenne vielleicht nicht so viele Tricks und Kombinationen wie die Person, die mir das Spiel früher beigebracht hat, aber ich kann Euch an die Grundlagen heranführen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht hellt sich auf.{/n} "Es wäre mir ein Vergnügen, {name}. Ich kenne vielleicht nicht so viele Tricks und Kombinationen wie die Person, die mir das Spiel früher beigebracht hat, aber ich kann Euch an die Grundlagen heranführen ..."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in yüzü aydınlanıyor.{/n} "Benim için büyük zevk olur {name}. Bir vakitler bana oyunu öğreten kişi kadar çok numara ve kombinasyon bilmesem de sana temellerini gösterebilirim..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's face brightens.{/n} "It would be my great pleasure, {name}. I may not know as many tricks and combinations as the person who once taught me, but I can introduce you to the basics—"
